title: Beach Cleanup Day
description: Help remove trash and debris from local beaches to protect marine life. Gloves and bags provided.

title: Food Bank Sorting
description: Sort and pack donated food items for distribution to families in need.

title: Animal Shelter Help
description: Assist with feeding, cleaning, and socializing rescued dogs and cats.

title: Tutoring Kids
description: Provide one-on-one tutoring in math and reading for elementary students.

title: Park Tree Planting
description: Plant native trees to restore urban green spaces. No experience needed!

title: Senior Center Bingo Night
description: Host a fun bingo night for seniors at the local community center.

title: Disaster Relief Training
description: Learn basic disaster response skills and join our volunteer network.

title: Library Storytime Volunteer
description: Read books and lead activities for preschoolers during weekly storytime.

title: Homeless Shelter Dinner Service
description: Prepare and serve meals to homeless individuals at the shelter.

title: Tech Workshop for Seniors
description: Teach seniors how to use smartphones, email, and social media.
